Reviews.Title: Replacement Sidekick
Reviews.Author: James Nagy Jr
Reviews.Content: Works Great, put my old card in it and it was like nothing ever happened, except the screen got clearer, the functions got faster, buttons got a little more sensitive, ah, new phone, speakers not going out no more, I'm in heaven.  Got the picture.

ProductInfo.Features:
This product has been extensively tested, is certified to be 100% functional, and ready for activation
Samsung offers a new take on the Sidekick combining the Sidekick form factor and features with modern specs and the Android smartphone platform
The Sidekick 4G features fast HSPA+ data, pop-up screen, large QWERTY keyboard, ample shortcuts to jump to apps, and unique group messaging and social networking apps and integration
This smartphone also features 1 GHz processor, touch screen, front-facing camera, and Wi-Fi with DLNA media streaming and mobile hotspot
Equipped with quad-band GSM and WCDMA modes, this device is capable of international use, and it also offers access to thousands of apps, games, movies, and music available on Google's Play Store
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Sidekick 4G SGH-T839 No Contract WiFi GSM Android Smartphone - White T-Mobile
